title: I cant login
body: the league client is not letting me login in both of my accounts, why?

replies.body: Seems like there is a problem with the login servers. Also having trouble logging in right now.

> [{quoted}](name=Cloudiebut,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=F7sQ9A9i,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-16T16:59:49.356+0000)
>
> Seems like there is a problem with the login servers. Also having trouble logging in right now.

same but on another thread riot said it's fixed, i don't know how that can be, because im not able to currently log in right now ether
Yea, the servers page said they were up but I found another thread somewhere else with this same problem

Did either of you recently update on Windows 10?  I had an error last night that said the login queue was very long, but I was able to login after multiple attempts.  I updated my computer this morning, and have not been able to get in, and it does not say anything about the queue.  It simply says it is unable to connect to the queue now.

> [{quoted}](name=VentressRedeemed,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=F7sQ9A9i,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2017-07-16T17:06:07.551+0000)
>
> Did either of you recently update on Windows 10?  I had an error last night that said the login queue was very long, but I was able to login after multiple attempts.  I updated my computer this morning, and have not been able to get in, and it does not say anything about the queue.  It simply says it is unable to connect to the queue now.

I actually did have a update last night on Windows 10, but i was able to log in last night no issues afterward and play several games, now it's not working for some reason
Yeah, everything is showing as up on their service status page, even though it isn't... bluh.
Okay, I was lost for a second because they didn't say anything about this. Thanks!
typical riot though, don't know what you expected

We did in fact have some minor hiccups with the NA login servers, but a fix was pushed out before too many people should have been affected. I tried to address everyone's topics about it, but it looks like I might have missed a few DX! Everything should be working normally now, but if you're still having problems signing in please reach out to our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
Yeah, I can log in now

> [{quoted}](name=I Cray I,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=F7sQ9A9i,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-07-16T17:10:23.279+0000)
>
> Yeah, I can log in now

I just got in now wooohoo

So I got on today and am unable to connect to the login queue.  Everything else works fine, just LoL.  It took a loong time and several tries for me to be able to even login to the forums here.  I ran through all the generic troubleshooting with the DNS, firewall, and all that.  Something has changed outside of my PC and now I can't get in.  I use Midcontinent for a provider (midco.net)
